mapper.insert: insert into course(userId, cTitle, cContent, cSummary) values(#{userId}, #{cTitle}, #{cContent}, #{cSummary})
mapper.select: select cTitle, cContent from course where userId=#{userId}
select cTitle, cContent from course where courseId=#{courseId}
mapper.update: update course set cTitle=#{cTitle}, cContent=#{cContent}, cSummary=#{cSummary} where courseId=#{courseId}
mapper.select: select * from course c join user u on u.userId = c.userId where cTitle Like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
